q: in a statement. David Cameron has repeatedly defended Andy Coulson , one of his inner circle, and on Friday defended his own judgement in hiring him after his resignation from the News of the World. I feel that he's been punished twice for the same offence. I chose to judge him by the work that he's done for me, for the government and for the country, David Cameron said. Opposition leader Ed Miliband said his Labour Party had been proved right to question Andy Coulson 's position.`` Labour has been saying for some months that there are real questions about Andy Coulson 's

Tyrone Hill added 20 points and 12 rebounds for the Sixers and Eric Snow had 11 points and 14 assists. Tracy McGrady added 20 for Toronto,

Former Republican state Rahm Emanuel Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Rahm Emanuel Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear frontrunner and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said.`` I think he'd clear the field.''
